summary: An email from Jessica Wind P. Abolafia, Director of the Anti-Trafficking Initiative at Sanctuary for Families, to an individual referred to as 'MB'. The email transmits draft documents for review and signature, offers to join a call for questions, and thanks MB for their support. The document is part of the Epstein case files but appears to be a routine administrative communication from a non-profit organization.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 19, 2022, from Jessica Wind P. Abolafia of Sanctuary for Families' Anti-Trafficking Initiative.
The email transmits unspecified draft documents to an individual referred to as 'MB' for review and signature.
The sender offers to join a call with the recipient and a colleague named Erica to answer any questions.
The document contains a standard confidentiality disclaimer and states it should not be construed as legal advice.
The document's direct connection to the Epstein case is not evident from the provided text; it appears to be routine organizational correspondence.
